RegistrationNumberError:
The Registration Number 
 must contain at least 6 characters.
PopUpContentForExit: Do you want to exit Shift?
BeginShiftPerson: Registration Number of the Person to Begin the Shift
TransferShiftPerson: Registration Number of the Person to be Transferred
TakePhotoRule: Take a photo with a prominent face.
TakeLocationRule: If you press the button, your location information will be obtained for 1 time and this process will be done in each process step. For this reason, you must allow the location.!
ShiftStartRule: What you must do for the start of the shift to be valid
ShiftTransferRule: Things to do in order to hand over the shift
ShiftEndRule: What you must do for the end of the shift to be valid
UserNotFound: No user found, please make sure that the registration number is correct!
